briefTitle: An Implantable Microstimulator for the Chronic Treatment of Urinary Urgency-Frequency Syndrome
officialTitle: Battery Powered Bion Clinical Investigation: Bion - An Implantable Microstimulator for the Chronic Treatment of Refractory Urinary Urgency-Frequency Syndrome
summary: The goal of this study is to investigate the safety and effectiveness of a new implanted device designed to treat Urinary Urgency-Frequency Syndrome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Average Number of Voids Per Day
